title: Freedom of Speech on Display in Charlottesville (Audio)
itunes:title: Freedom of Speech on Display in Charlottesville (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Josh Blackman, a professor at the South Texas College of Law in Houston, discusses the line between freedom of speech and unlawful assembly after demonstrations in Charlottesville, VA turned violent over the weekend. He speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
(Bloomberg) -- Josh Blackman, a professor at the South Texas College of Law in Houston, discusses the line between freedom of speech and unlawful assembly after demonstrations in Charlottesville, VA turned violent over the weekend. He speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
